org.archive.crawler

类 CommandLineParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.archive.crawler.CommandLineParser

  • public class CommandLineParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Print Heritrix command-line usage message.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明

      Override so can customize usage output.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • CommandLineParser

        public CommandLineParser(java.lang.String[] args,
                 java.io.PrintWriter out,
                 java.lang.String version)
                  throws org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException
        Constructor.
        参数:
        args - Command-line arguments to process.
        out - PrintStream to write on.
        version - Heritrix version
        抛出:
        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException - Failied parse of command line.

    • 方法详细资料

      • usage

        public void usage()
        Print usage then exit.

      • usage

        public void usage(int exitCode)
        Print usage then exit.
        参数:
        exitCode -

      • usage

        public void usage(java.lang.String message,
         int exitCode)
        Print message then usage then exit. The JVM exits inside in this method.
        参数:
        message - Message to print before we do usage.
        exitCode - Exit code to use in call to System.exit.

      • message

        public void message(java.lang.String message,
           int exitCode)
        Print message and then exit. The JVM exits inside in this method.
        参数:
        message - Message to print before we do usage.
        exitCode - Exit code to use in call to System.exit.

        返回:
